thread.section_title: Servcorp Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servcorp | servcorp.com.au
thread.title: Don

author: Don
title: Don
text:
As a tenant here for a few years, I cannot speak highly enough of the work surroundings but more importantly the staff that work here. They are forever pleasant and willing to help me out with any requests, no matter how trivial they may be. Well done Hayley and her team!
I would certainly recommend to anyone considering the services of Servcorp, that you would find it difficult to locate a more professional, enjoyable or relaxed work environment.
